name: LPMD_S_XML_SYSTEMD_KILL_PROCESS_CHECK
summary: With default xml configuration, run lpmd with systemd options: intel_lpmd --loglevel=debug --dbus-enable --no-daemon --systemd; then foce enter low power mode and kill the process, change the xml configuration to set power setting to 1, and re-launch the lpmd with systemd options, at last kill the 2nd lpmd process and check journal log to see any error.
